editorialNotes.standard: Miniclipâ€™s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.Â
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!

ios.subtitle: Tap, Dig, Build a Great Empire

editorialNotes.tagline: Start a new life in the country
editorialNotes.standard: Running a farm is hard and often thankless workâ€”unless that farm happens to be an adorable piece of virtual land overseen by a helpful, chatty scarecrow. Swiping across plots of land to harvest crops, feed livestock and manufacture goods is pleasantly relaxing, and growing your tiny farm into a booming business is a hugely satisfying achievement. Silly characters, cute critters and a variety of things to plant, reap, build and sell make Hay Day easy to pick up and tough to put down.

editorialNotes.short: You've got one Golden Shot for massive prizes.

editorialNotes.standard: If youâ€™ve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. Itâ€™s delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in PokÃ©mon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If youâ€™re a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.

name: Need for Speed No Limits Game

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.
